server
Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--server.ClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, SocketConnection
public class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, SocketConnection

A threaded connection class to maintain the conneciton to the client a new ClientConnection must be create for each new client

Version:
0.8
Author:
Joseph Monti countjoe@users.sourceforge.net

channel

public void channel(boolean nc,
                    java.lang.String n,
                    java.lang.String p)
recieves a channel change

Specified by:
channel in interface SocketConnection
Parameters:
nc - true for a new channel, if the channel exists an error is sent back to the user, otherwise the channel is created and a recursive call is made to switch the user to the new channel; if false it checks the validity of the request and move the user
n - the name of the channel
p - password for the channel, if one

Parameters:
username - the name of the user, not used in this case (it should be null)
message - the messsage sent by the user
